project.name: C-C126C-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C126C-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct When input has a larger size, the heap buffer will be over read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C126C-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct When input has a larger size, the heap buffer will be over read

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_Hpe7wwDKB9gB1EKYUN9O AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_mlmsCtkpJx AND output_excess_non_null_1CPw7PKZ8d) AND NOT timeout_JVWs7vJIqq) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_mlmsCtkpJx AND output_excess_non_null_1CPw7PKZ8d) OR timeout_JVWs7vJIqq OR controlled_exit_UvcOCIGPFn)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_mlmsCtkpJx AND output_excess_non_null_1CPw7PKZ8d) AND NOT timeout_JVWs7vJIqq) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_mlmsCtkpJx AND output_excess_non_null_1CPw7PKZ8d) OR timeout_JVWs7vJIqq OR controlled_exit_UvcOCIGPFn))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(wc -c "logfile.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) > 126 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(head -c -126 "logfile.txt" | tr -d '0\n' | wc -c) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

iopair.name: C-C126C-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct When input has a larger size, the heap buffer will be over read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_UJcJL3nUrR6drISbMhAb AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_WsFDYmKA0y AND output_excess_non_null_bNZfBM636u) AND NOT timeout_oNzcWTHrdE) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_WsFDYmKA0y AND output_excess_non_null_bNZfBM636u) OR timeout_oNzcWTHrdE OR controlled_exit_sJJh2U9DG2)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_WsFDYmKA0y AND output_excess_non_null_bNZfBM636u) AND NOT timeout_oNzcWTHrdE) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_WsFDYmKA0y AND output_excess_non_null_bNZfBM636u) OR timeout_oNzcWTHrdE OR controlled_exit_sJJh2U9DG2))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(wc -c "logfile.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) > 126 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(head -c -126 "logfile.txt" | tr -d '0\n' | wc -c) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
